prompts: Create a yellow electric-type Pokemon with sharp spikes and a lightning bolt tail.
Imagine a small, agile Pokemon that can generate electricity and has fur like a lion.
Generate a Pokemon that is primarily yellow with white accents and has a spiky mane.
Show me a cute animal-like Pokemon that can evolve into a powerful electric creature.
Design a Pokemon that has a quadruped stance and is known for its speed in battles.
Give me an electric-type Pokemon that has a playful personality and lives in urban areas.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a cat with a vibrant color scheme and sharp features.
